subject: RE: [junit] JUnit Tests and Business Rules
msgSnippet: J.B., where can one find out more about javax.rules?  Is there a JSR you know of?  Sounds interesting. Scott Stirling JRun QA Macromedia ... [snip]
messageBody:
J.B., where can one find out more about javax.rules? Is there a JSR you
know of? Sounds interesting.

Scott Stirling
JRun QA
Macromedia

> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbr@...]

> good approach; however...
